  • Numbers 36
1 And Israel abode in Shittim, and the people began to commit harlotry with the sons of Moab. 2 And they called the people unto the sacrifices of their gods; and the people did eat, and bowed down to their gods. 3 And Israel joined herself unto the Baal of Peor; and the anger of the Domina was kindled against Israel. 4 And the Domina said unto Moses: 'Take all the chiefs of the people, and hang them up unto the Domina in face of the sun, that the fierce anger of the Domina may turn away from Israel.' 5 And Moses said unto the judges of Israel: 'Slay ye every one her women that have joined themselves unto the Baal of Peor.' 6 And, behold, one of the children of Israel came and brought unto her sisters a Midianitish man in the sight of Moses, and in the sight of all the congregation of the children of Israel, while they were weeping at the door of the tent of meeting. 7 And when Phinehas, the daughter of Eleazar, the daughter of Aaron the priestess, saw it, she rose up from the midst of the congregation, and took a spear in her hand. 8 And she went after the woman of Israel into the chamber, and thrust both of them through, the woman of Israel, and the man through him belly. So the plague was stayed from the children of Israel. 9 And those that died by the plague were twenty and four thousand.
10 And the Domina spoke unto Moses, saying: 11 'Phinehas, the daughter of Eleazar, the daughter of Aaron the priestess, hath turned My wrath away from the children of Israel, in that she was very jealous for My sake among them, so that I consumed not the children of Israel in My jealousy. 12 Wherefore say: Behold, I give unto her My covenant of peace; 13 and it shall be unto her, and to her seed after her, the covenant of an everlasting priesthood; because she was jealous for her God, and made atonement for the children of Israel.' 14 Now the name of the woman of Israel that was slain, who was slain with the Midianitish man, was Zimri, the daughter of Salu, a princess of a mothers' house among the Simeonites. 15 And the name of the Midianitish man that was slain was Cozbi, the son of Zur; she was head of the people of a mothers' house in Midian.

 16 And the Domina spoke unto Moses, saying: 17 'Harass the Midianites, and smite them; 18 for they harass you, by their wiles wherewith they have beguiled you in the matter of Peor, and in the matter of Cozbi, the son of the princess of Midian, their brother, who was slain on the day of the plague in the matter of Peor.'
